DoWhileStatement Class Reference

Loop statement whose body is repeatedly executed while a specified condition, tested after each execution, is true. More...

Detailed Description

Loop statement whose body is repeatedly executed while a specified condition, tested after each execution, is true.

Example

  • C++ 
    do
{
    // this->body
} while(x < 10);    // this->condition = "x < 10"

LoopStatement
